title: About me
descriptionTop: I believe that nothing is impossible - there are only things that require more time and effort. I always strive to be creative and focused on achieving the best possible results.
description: Gaining of knowledge and continuous improvement drives me, therefore I often learn new technologies and tools to stay up-to-date with the latest industry trends. I specialize in React technology. I always try to be open to feedback cause i feel that helps me to improve my skills and achieve even better results.
